showcaseProjects.title: Fitted
showcaseProjects.description: A revolutionary mobile application that transforms how people organize their wardrobe. Fitted combines AI-powered outfit recommendations with intuitive closet management, helping users make better fashion choices daily.
showcaseProjects.challenge: Users struggle to remember what clothes they own and how to combine them effectively.
showcaseProjects.solution: An intelligent app that catalogs your wardrobe, suggests outfits based on weather and occasions, and helps you maximize your existing clothing.

showcaseProjects.title: MyPlace
showcaseProjects.description: A comprehensive property management solution that streamlines the entire rental process. MyPlace connects landlords, tenants, and property managers in one seamless platform.
showcaseProjects.challenge: Property management involves countless manual processes, paperwork, and communication gaps.
showcaseProjects.solution: An all-in-one platform that digitizes lease management, automates rent collection, and provides real-time property insights.

showcaseProjects.title: Finom
showcaseProjects.description: A modern business banking platform designed for startups and SMEs. Finom combines banking, invoicing, and expense management in one powerful interface.
showcaseProjects.challenge: Small businesses need enterprise-grade financial tools without the complexity.
showcaseProjects.solution: A streamlined banking experience with embedded financial services, real-time analytics, and automated bookkeeping.
